title: Definitions
context: [ยง21E-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: &ldquo;Committee&rdquo; means the joint legislative management committee established under this chapter. &ldquo;Legislative service agency&rdquo; means the office of the auditor, the office of the legislative reference bureau, and the office of the ombudsman. &ldquo;Legislative service agency director&rdquo; means the director or administrative head of a legislative service agency. &ldquo;Member&rdquo; means a member of the joint legislative management committee. [L 1990, c 127, pt of ยง2]
